name: Cubes-Colors-Chaos
description:
Playtest Questionnaire: 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc4POq50YB0tr_QK4ttYR5AM-cuxeuNpqpKgIZm7gtDm0I0Sg/viewform

Become the true hero and restore the core that brings color to the planet, broken by an evil alien. You the player must stop the alien by powering up each cube, beating it s genre of levels and fighting the alien.

Crew

  • William Wright - Lead Programmer/ Narrative Designer
  • Briana Skyes -Lead  Artist / Level artist
  • Aaron Robley - Lead Audio/ Composer
  • Jerry Mayton - Lead Level Design / Narrative Designer
